You also take part in preparation for an interview with the Customer (provide information about possible questions, suggest trainings to attend).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Employees from your pool can be booked by PM/DM/AM of the Project or Opportunity once you propose them, but you should check whether the booking is still valid. Bookings are valid for 2 weeks only. After that time, the Project/Delivery Manager should assign the candidate to a specific project position or release the candidate.
